identity.name: Chez Loman
identity.vibe: Sophisticated, Intimate, Culinary Excellence, Modern African

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-accent italic tracking-tight leading-none
usage.label: text-xs font-body uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-gold

layout_strategies.alignment: Asymmetrical balance. Never center text unless it's a poetic stanza.
layout_strategies.hero_style: Cinematic Fullscreen with Dark Green Overlay + Gold Typography

buttons.primary: bg-secondary text-primary hover:bg-white hover:text-primary transition-all duration-500 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold tracking-wide shadow-glow
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-secondary text-secondary hover:bg-secondary hover:text-primary transition-all duration-500 rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-medium tracking-wide
buttons.ghost: text-white hover:text-secondary transition-colors duration-300 underline-offset-8 hover:underline

cards.menu_item: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 border border-white/5 transition-all duration-500 p-6 rounded-xl
cards.feature: bg-primary/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 p-8 rounded-2xl hover:border-secondary/30 transition-all duration-500

navigation.classes: fixed top-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-50 bg-black/20 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-4 flex items-center gap-8

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (recommended for luxury)

general: Implement the 'Jewel & Luxury' archetype. Dark, moody, expensive.
Use the provided user assets prominently but tastefully (e.g., in shaped frames or parallax containers).
STRICTLY AVOID generic orange/terracotta. Use Gold (#D4AF37) for all accents.
Ensure the 'Green' is the specific #1A4D3E from the logo, or darker variants.
Use 'Manrope' for body text and 'Playfair Display' for headings. Import them via Google Fonts.
Create a 'design_system' folder or file to centralize these constants if possible, or just hardcode in Tailwind config.

pages.home: Hero with video/image background (darkened). 'Book Table' CTA in Gold. Section for 'Signature Dishes' using Bento Grid.
pages.menu: Not a PDF list. Interactive, categorized menu with hover effects on items. Prices in Gold.
pages.about: Storytelling focus. Use the 'Staff' and 'Client' photos here. Text should be poetic.
pages.gallery: Masonry layout. Mix of food, interior, and people shots.
pages.contact: Minimalist form. Gold borders. Map integration style: Dark mode map.

animations.loading: Gold progress bar or logo pulse.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
